title: Choose Your Learning Plan
subtitle: Start learning for free or upgrade to unlock all features and courses.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.
faq.q2: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a2: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers for enterprise plans.
faq.a3: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, we'll refund your purchase.
faq.a4: Yes! Students get 50% off Pro plans. Contact support with valid student ID for the discount code.

cta.title: Still have questions?
cta.subtitle: Our team is here to help. Contact us for more information.
